00039 #ifndef _FC_QUEUE_H
00040 #define _FC_QUEUE_H

00042 #include <assert.h>
00043 #include <stddef.h>
00044 #include <algorithm>
00045 #include <new>

00047 #if defined(BOOST_CONFIG_HPP) && !defined(_FC_QUEUE_NO_BOOST_TYPETRAITS)
00048 # include <boost/type_traits.hpp>
00049 # define __true_type  boost::true_type
00050 # define __false_type boost::false_type
00051 #elif defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)
00052 # include <stl/type_traits.h>
00053 # if !defined(_STLP_HAS_NO_NAMESPACES)
00054 using std::__type_traits;
00055 using std::__true_type;
00056 using std::__false_type;
00057 # endif

00060 #else
00061 # include <type_traits.h>

00063 
00067 template <class _Tp>
00068 class fc_queue
00069 {
00070 public:
00071     typedef _Tp                 value_type;
00072     typedef size_t              size_type;
00073     typedef value_type*         pointer;
00074     typedef const value_type*   const_pointer;
00075     typedef value_type&         reference;
00076     typedef const value_type&   const_reference;
00077 
00084     fc_queue() : _M_nodes_array(NULL), _M_new(NULL), _M_front(NULL)
00085                , _M_size(0), _M_max_size(0) {}
00086 
00092     explicit fc_queue(size_type max_size)
00093     {
00094         _M_initialize(max_size);
00095     }
00096 
00102     fc_queue(const fc_queue& rhs);
00103 
00107     ~fc_queue()
00108     {
00109         while (_M_front)
00110         {
00111             destroy(&_M_front->_M_data);
00112             _M_front = _M_front->_M_next;
00113         }
00114         delete[] _M_nodes_array;
00115     }
00116 
00122     fc_queue& operator=(const fc_queue& rhs)
00123     {
00124         fc_queue temp(rhs);
00125         swap(temp);
00126         return *this;
00127     }
00128 
00136     void initialize(size_type max_size)
00137     {
00138         assert(uninitialized());
00139         _M_initialize(max_size);
00140     }
00141 
00147     bool uninitialized() const
00148     {
00149         return _M_nodes_array == NULL;
00150     }
00151 
00157     bool empty() const
00158     {
00159         return _M_size == 0;
00160     }
00161 
00168     bool full() const
00169     {
00170         return _M_size == _M_max_size;
00171     }
00172 
00178     size_type capacity() const
00179     {
00180         return _M_max_size;
00181     }
00182 
00188     size_type size() const
00189     {
00190         return _M_size;
00191     }
00192 
00198     reference front()
00199     {
00200         assert(!empty());
00201         return *(pointer)(&_M_front->_M_data);
00202     }
00203 
00209     const_reference front() const
00210     {
00211         assert(!empty());
00212         return *(const_pointer)(&_M_front->_M_data);
00213     }
00214 
00220     reference back()
00221     {
00222         assert(!empty());
00223         return *(pointer)(&_M_back->_M_data);
00224     }
00225 
00231     const_reference back() const
00232     {
00233         assert(!empty());
00234         return *(const_pointer)(&_M_back->_M_data);
00235     };
00236 
00243     void push(const value_type& value)
00244     {
00245         // Use the temporary (register) variable to eliminate
00246         // repeatedly loading the same value from memory
00247         register _Node* new_node = _M_new;
00248         construct(&new_node->_M_data, value);
00249         if (full())
00250             pop();
00251         if (empty())
00252             _M_front = _M_back = new_node;
00253         else
00254         {
00255             _M_back->_M_next = new_node;
00256             _M_back          = new_node;
00257         }
00258         _M_new = _M_new->_M_next;
00259         assert(_M_new != NULL);
00260         new_node->_M_next = NULL;
00261         ++_M_size;
00262     }
00263 
00267     void pop()
00268     {
00269         assert(!empty());
00270         destroy(&_M_front->_M_data);
00271         _Node* old_front = _M_front;
00272         _M_front = old_front->_M_next;
00273         assert(_M_free_nodes_end->_M_next == NULL);
00274         _M_free_nodes_end->_M_next = old_front;
00275         _M_free_nodes_end = old_front;
00276         old_front->_M_next = NULL;
00277         --_M_size;
00278     }
00279 
00286     bool contains(const value_type& value) const
00287     {
00288         register _Node* node = _M_front;
00289         while (node)
00290         {
00291             if (value == *(const_pointer)(&node->_M_data))
00292                 return true;
00293             node = node->_M_next;
00294         }
00295         return false;
00296     }
00297 
00303     void swap(fc_queue& rhs)
00304     {
00305         std::swap(_M_nodes_array,    rhs._M_nodes_array);
00306         std::swap(_M_free_nodes_end, rhs._M_free_nodes_end);
00307         std::swap(_M_new,            rhs._M_new);
00308         std::swap(_M_front,          rhs._M_front);
00309         std::swap(_M_back,           rhs._M_back);
00310         std::swap(_M_size,           rhs._M_size);
00311         std::swap(_M_max_size,       rhs._M_max_size);
00312     }
00313 
00314 protected:
00316     struct _Node
00317     {
00318         _Node*  _M_next;
00319         char    _M_data[sizeof(_Tp)];
00320     };
00321     _Node*      _M_nodes_array;
00322     _Node*      _M_free_nodes_end;
00323     _Node*      _M_new;
00324     _Node*      _M_front;
00325     _Node*      _M_back;
00326     size_type   _M_size;
00327     size_type   _M_max_size;
00328 
00329 protected:
00330     void _M_initialize(size_type max_size);
00331     void _M_destroy(void* pointer, __true_type)
00332     {}
00333     void _M_destroy(void* pointer, __false_type)
00334     {
00335         ((_Tp*)pointer)->~_Tp();
00336     }
00337     void destroy(void* pointer)
00338     {
00339 #if defined(BOOST_CONFIG_HPP) && !defined(_FC_QUEUE_NO_BOOST_TYPETRAITS)
00340         _M_destroy(pointer, boost::has_trivial_destructor<_Tp>());
00341 #else
00342         _M_destroy(pointer,
00343                   typename __type_traits<_Tp>::has_trivial_destructor());
00344 #endif
00345     }
00346     void construct(void* pointer, const _Tp& value)
00347     {
00348         new (pointer) _Tp(value);
00349     }
00350 };
00351 
00352 template <class _Tp>
00353 fc_queue<_Tp>::fc_queue(const fc_queue& rhs)
00354     : _M_nodes_array(NULL), _M_front(NULL)
00355 {
00356     fc_queue temp(rhs._M_max_size);
00357     _Node* node = rhs._M_front;
00358     while (node)
00359     {
00360         temp.push(*(pointer)(&node->_M_data));
00361         node = node->_M_next;
00362     }
00363     assert(temp.size() == rhs.size());
00364     swap(temp);
00365 }
00366 
00367 template <class _Tp>
00368 void fc_queue<_Tp>::_M_initialize(size_type max_size)
00369 {
00370     size_type i;
00371     _M_nodes_array = new _Node[max_size + 1];
00372     _M_new = _M_nodes_array;
00373     for (i = 0; i < max_size; ++i)
00374         _M_nodes_array[i]._M_next = _M_nodes_array + i + 1;
00375     _M_nodes_array[i]._M_next = NULL;
00376     _M_free_nodes_end = _M_nodes_array + max_size;
00377     _M_front = NULL;
00378     _M_back = NULL;
00379     _M_size = 0;
00380     _M_max_size = max_size;
00381 }
00382 
00383 #endif // _FC_QUEUE_H
